source: buy a pig in a poke
lemma: buy a pig in a poke
definitions: To purchase something without first seeing it or knowing its true value or condition.
examples: She bought the car sight unseen, truly buying a pig in a poke.
Don't buy a pig in a poke when it comes to real estate.
He regretted buying a pig in a poke after the package arrived damaged.
